questions.question: In React's rendering process, what is the correct, fundamental order of the three main phases that occur when state or props change?
Memo (not useMemo) will only re-render when...
options: Context that it's suscribed to changes

questions.question: Which tool you can use to avoid useless rerenders?
Which pattern design would you use if you have a component that constantly changes without using memoization?
options: Move parent state to a context

questions.question: In React, which data types are treated as 'new' on every re-render when passed as props, even if their content remains identical?
Which kind of type data memoize useMemo?
Which kind of type data memoize useCallback?
